original_text: So the people came to Moses and they said, ‘We did a bad thing when we spoke against the Lord and against you. Please pray to the Lord on our behalf. Ask him to remove the snakes from us.’ So Moses prayed for the people.
korean_text: 백성이 모세에게 이르러 말하되 우리가 여호와와 당신을 향하여 원망함으로 범죄하였사오니 여호와께 기도하여 이 뱀들을 우리에게서 떠나게 하소서 모세가 백성을 위하여 기도하매

sentences.original_text: So the people came to Moses
when we spoke against the Lord
Please pray to the Lord on our behalf.
sentences.korean_translation: 제발 우리를 위해 주께 기도해 주십시오.

sentences.original_text: Ask him to remove the snakes from us.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 우리에게서 뱀을 없애달라고 요청해 주십시오.'

sentences.original_text: So Moses prayed for the people.
